attributes.action: resign and hand over power to the people who this government claims to serve yet has shown no evidence to prove it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Get rid of this joke of a government that don't listen to the people who they pay to advise them and also dont listen to the people they serve. Thats right, they work for us not the other way round. We should say if they deserve our tax money to spend on their homes and making unjust laws that have no relevence in modern society. How can we let them make cannabis a class B again when a celebrity heroin junkie can get out of prison in 20 days? They are a joke of a government and must be stopped

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
